items.question: What image formats are supported for perspective correction?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. For best results, use high-resolution images that are clear and well-lit.

items.question: How customizable are the adjustments?
items.answer: Our tool allows for precise adjustments to ensure your images are perfectly aligned according to your preferences.

items.question: Can I correct multiple images at once?
items.answer: Yes! Use our batch processing feature to correct the perspective of multiple images simultaneously.

items.question: How does the AI ensure quality after correction?
items.answer: The AI maintains the original image quality while applying corrections, preserving all essential details.

items.question: Are there any limits to the number of corrections I can make?
items.answer: No, you can make as many corrections as needed without any limits under the pay-as-you-go model.

items.question: Will I retain full rights to the images after correction?
items.answer: Yes, all images corrected through our service include full commercial rights with no additional fees.

items.question: How quickly can I expect my images to be corrected?
items.answer: Most corrections are processed within seconds, depending on the complexity of the adjustments made.

items.question: What if I need help using the tool?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support, including detailed guides and a responsive support team available via chat and email.

items.question: Can I enhance the corrected images further?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can use additional tools for further enhancements after the perspective correction has been applied.
